text: On 12 August 2022, a mass shooting happened in Cetinje, Montenegro. A man killed ten people and injured six others. The shooting was caused by a fight between the shooter and people renting his home. The gunman was Vučko Borilović. He was shot and killed by an armed civilian. It is the deadliest mass shooting in Montenegro's history. ==References== Category:2022 in Europe Category:2022 mass shootings Category:2020s mass shootings in Europe Category:2020s murders in Europe Category:August 2022 events Category:2020s in Montenegro Category:Mass murder in 2022
title: 2022 Cetinje shooting
